quest.name: A Swarm Welcome
journal:
Eshana needs you to borrow a griffin's wings.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Use the griffin's Buffet ability on frenzied swarms.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Ah, jussst the ssstrider I wanted to sssee. We have sssoldiers out on a joint training exercise, and they've sssent a requessst for aid.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: As matters ssstand, you'll be needing a griffin to render the necessary assistance. Giff will explain the sssituation.

dialogue.name: GIFF
dialogue.text: Here to lend a hand, are you, lasslad? I don't know what Eshana's told you, but it seems our fighters are being swarmed by tiny flying vilekin. Actual swarms of them.

dialogue.name: GIFF
dialogue.text: I don't know what our folk did to annoy them, but once those pests get riled up, there's no shooing them away.

dialogue.name: GIFF
dialogue.text: My plan is for you to fly a griffin over to Virdjala, and have it disperse those biting buggers with a good buffet from its wings.

dialogue.name: GIFF
dialogue.text: Once you're done, you can hop off wherever you please─the griffin's trained to return to me after the rider dismounts. Might be easiest if you report directly to Eshana, of course.

dialogue.name: HIGHLANDERSSOLDIERA
dialogue.text: Hells-spawned fiends! There's a dozen more for every one I swat!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A swarm of vilekin is attacking this soldier. Speak with Giff in Castellum Velodyna and borrow a griffin for its Buffet ability.

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIERA
dialogue.text: I've ssslapped and ssswiped a hundred times but they won't leave him be!

dialogue.name: HIGHLANDERSSOLDIERA
dialogue.text: Oof! Why did you─ Oh, they're gone! Thank Rhalgr!

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIERA
dialogue.text: ...And thank you. If you hadn't come, my comrade here would have been bitten and stung to death.

dialogue.name: HIGHLANDERSSOLDIERA
dialogue.text: Aye, not exactly the kind of training I signed up for. We'd best find a new place to spar.

dialogue.name: HIGHLANDERSSOLDIERB
dialogue.text: Godsdamn these winged demons! Get away from me!

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIERB
dialogue.text: Go on! Shoo! ...Ugh, it'sss hopeless!

dialogue.name: HIGHLANDERSSOLDIERB
dialogue.text: Phew... Thank you so much. I thought those little bastards would eat me alive...

dialogue.name: ANANTASOLDIERB
dialogue.text: Those pesssts ignored me and flew ssstraight at him. Curious. We'll head back for now, and have this ssstrider's wounds ssseen to.

dialogue.name: GIFF
dialogue.text: Lost your griffin, did you? Here, try to stay in the saddle this time.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Was Giff's plan a sssuccess?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: That is a relief. Being blasssted by a griffin's wings was likely unpleasant, but better that than sssuffer a ssslow death from a ssswarm.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: I am told by my sssisters that it was only those of certain ssstock who were targeted by the vilekin─they've a tassste for Highlander blood, it would ssseem. It is a wonder that you did not fall victim to the sssame fate.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: I am told by my sssisters that it was only those of certain ssstock who were targeted by the vilekin─they've a tassste for Highlander blood, it would ssseem.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Ssspeaking of which, Giff is apparently terrified of those insssects. He mussst have been glad indeed that you arrived to perform the ressscue in his ssstead...

dialogue.name: GIFF
dialogue.text: You've blown away those little buggers then, have you? Head over to Eshana and tell her the good news.
